name: Luminia Chronicles <Demo>
description:
You wake up in a field of flowers, the only thing you remember is your name.
A kind stranger offers to take you around her town to see if you remember anything and before you know it,  a grand journey begins.


Notes:
This is only a demo, as such, anything is subject to change, if you have any advice/suggestions you'd like to give, you can contact me on Twitter (@MismiGalei) or on Discord (Aidan#6878)
Any and all third party materials (music, sprites, character portraits, etc) are not owned by me and are being used as placeholders for the time being. 
Any third party music is there to set a tone for the scene and will be replaced with original music for the full release
This is my first time publishing anything I've made to a game publishing website, as such, it might not be up to everyone's standards, but I hope you enjoy it regardless.
